Text: Marston Industry Update Press release from CAEM Re FTC Comments V OROFFICES OF PHILIP MARSTON Suite N Lee Street Alexandria VA Tel Fax Email TO Marstons Distribution List Attached for your information is a press release that has been issued today by the Center for the Advancement of Energy Markets CAEM or Center regarding recent comments the Center filed with the Federal Trade Commission in response to the FTCs inquiry into retail electricity markets Docket V A copy of the Comments and a separate file comprising an Attachment thereto is also attached below These documents are being distributed to you at the request of the Center to distribute them to industry participants who may find them of interest If you do not wish to receive such communications in the future please email with word REMOVE in the subject line Regards PMM Files Attached Follow Press Release Comments of CAEM in FTC Docket V Attachment to CAEM Comments Exec Sum of REM IMPORTANT NOTICE This email message is intended for the exclusive use of the personss identified above It may contain information that is attorney work product privileged confidential or exempt from disclosure under applicable law If you are not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited Please notify the sender immediately and delete the message from your computer files Thank you Press Release Announcing FTC FILINGPDF Comments of CAEM in VPDF Attachment to Comments XENERGY REMpdf
